title: Statement from Press Secretary Robert Gibbs on General McKiernan | whitehouse.gov
content:
The White House




May 11, 2009

 



Statement from Press Secretary Robert Gibbs on General McKiernan




THE WHITE HOUSE   Office of the Press Secretary  ____________________________________________________________  FOR IMMEDIATE RELEASE                                 May 11, 2009  Statement from Press Secretary Robert Gibbs on General McKiernan    "The President agreed with the recommendation of the Secretary of Defense and Chairman of the Joint Chiefs of Staff that the implementation of a new strategy in Afghanistan called for new military leadership. The President was grateful for and impressed by the leadership that General McKiernan demonstrated in calling for additional resources for the fight in Afghanistan.  This change of direction in Afghanistan in no way diminishes the President’s deep respect for Gen. McKiernan and his decades of public service."
